senses.sense_definition: Relating to a <w>psalter</w> (a book of psalms) or a <w>psaltery</w> (an ancient stringed instrument).

examples.text: The historian examined the <w>psalterian</w> illustrations found in the margins of the medieval manuscript.
The concert featured <w>psalterian</w> music played on authentic reproductions of twelfth-century instruments.

traits.comment: The word is infrequently used in modern English.
Used in the context of music history or instruments.
